Articles.Content: I bought a copy of kerbalspaceprogram off of the website and through paypal. Paypal sent an email saying that the money was sent. Now how do I download the game? I didn't make an account so I can't login to anything. Kerbalspaceprogram never sent a giftcode to the email either so the money was taken.

Hi @LightningZap, we cannot do anything about account or purchase issues on the forums, please contact Squad technical support at [email protected] and explain what has happened, and include the paypal receipt number, they will be able to help you.

There won't be anyone in the office until tomorrow morning Mexico time, so please be patient.
